name: Mistletoe Kisses, Christmas Stocking
description:
Mistletoe Kisses is the newest in a series of Christmas 2013 designs by Jenny McWhinney. Featuring a pair of mice that have found themselves caught beneath the mistletoe.
The project is worked in an array of silks & boutique veriagated threads, on a fine oatmeal linen.
Get stitching now, and surprise a fellow stitcher with a unique handmade gift this Holiday Season.

Kit Includes:
All threads, needles, transfer material, beads, 
embroidery fabric & construction fabric to complete one Mistletoe Kisses stocking.
All patterns, instructions, diagrams & images to 
successfully complete the thread painted robin.

name: Stained Glass Window, Christmas Stocking Kit
description:
Stained Glass Window is the newest in a series of Christmas 2013 designs by Jenny McWhinney. Featuring a petite robin sitting infront of a multi-hued leadlight window, sparkling in the fresh winter's snow.
The project is worked in an array of silks & boutique veriagated threads, on a fine oatmeal linen.
Get stitching now, and surprise a fellow stitcher with a unique handmade gift this Holiday Season.

Kit Includes:
All threads, needles, transfer material, beads, 
embroidery fabric & construction fabric to complete one Stained Glass Window stocking.
All patterns, instructions, diagrams & images to 
successfully complete the thread painted robin.

name: Christmas Robin Heart
description: A little robin notices the first sprinkle of sparkling Christmas snow as he perches gracefully among the mistletoe and holly. Stitched on your choice of rich navy fine wool blanketing or natural linen, this festive door hanger features a thread painted heart-shaped centerpiece, framed with a gathered frill and finished with a decorative bow and luscious golden Christmas bell. This lovely door hanger will make the perfect gift for a fellow stitcher, just in time for Christmas!

name: Birds of a Feather Table Runner
description:
This delightful table runner features a chirpy flock of featherd friends. Stitched in Jenny's unique style of redwork with a contemporary twist, this table runner is a simple yet vibrant project that is suitable for both beginners & experioenced stitchers alike.
 
Kit includes:
All instructions, diagramsb& images needed to create both the embroidery & runner construction
-all threads, needles, transfer material & fabrics required

name: Sakura Pigma Micron Pen (0.5, brown)
description: Used for tracing designs onto transfer materials in preparation of embroidery and stitchery designs.

name: The Redwork Circus, Book by Jenny McWhinney
description:
Well known for her thread painting and popular embroidery designs, Jenny McWhinney loves to share her ideas and inspire other stitchers. In her most recent book, The Redwork Circus, Jenny creates a whimsical world from ‘Le Petit Cirque Rouge’ filled with jolly clowns doing tricks and their adorable animal assistants. In her long awaited second book, Jenny explores her passion for quilting by transforming her charming illustrative imagery into simplistic stitchery designs. 

The designs stitched in Redwork are suitable for beginners as well as experienced stitchers. The simple stitches used and the stitchery guide provided make it easy for you to recreate Jenny’s beautiful designs.

To showcase these embroideries, there are nine practical sewing projects, ranging from easy to more challenging. For instance, you could begin with the nursery picture and then progress to more difficult projects, such as the doorstop. And keen quilters will wish to make the nine-block quilt. 

Each project has:
•	shopping lists of materials 
•	step-by-step instructions
•	how-to illustrations and diagrams
•	stitchery guide
•	helpful tips
•	fabric suggestions
•	tracing patterns
•	stitchery glossary.


The Redwork Circus will captivate and inspire. It is an essential addition to your needlework library.

name: Shanghai Taxi Jewellery Fold
description:
Shanghai Taxi is a new project by Jenny McWhinney that features a pair of her much loved mice designs. Stitched whilst Jenny was on holiday in China, these delightful mice capture all the excitement of the orient. 

Worked on a crisp Osnaberg fabric, this design can be made into a number of charming textiles. This particular kit includes all materials required to assemble the design into a gorgeous jewellery fold. The jewellery fold features two zippered pockets, a mesh earring store, and a cilindrical ring keeper. Store all your precious treasures within this delightful jewellery fold whilst on your travels.

Kit Includes:
 - threads
 - needles
 - transfer material
 - embroidery fabric
 - iron-on interfacing
 - iron-on pellon
 - 2 x contrasting construction fabrics
 - 2 x matching zippers
 - mesh
 - 2 x buttons
 - tassel threads
 - detailed instructions/patterns (for both the embroidery & jewellery fold construction)

Kits for the embroidered design only are also available. Please see separate listing.

*Beads for tassel (as shown in the sampler) are not included.

name: Shanghai Taxi
description:
Shanghai Taxi is a new project by Jenny McWhinney that features a pair of her much loved mice designs. Stitched whilst Jenny was on holiday in China, these delightful mice capture all the excitement of the orient. 

Worked on a crisp Osnaberg fabric, this design can be made into a number of charming textiles - from needle books, to thread keepers, or even a cushion or framed picture. Delicately stitched in a contrast of stranded cottons and silks, Shanghai Taxi is a project for all skill levels and tastes.    

Kit Includes:
 - threads
 - needles
 - transfer material
 - embroidery fabric
 - detailed instructions/patterns

Complete kits for the Shanghai Taxi Jewellery Fold (as per Jenny's sampler as shown) are also available. Please see separate listing.

name: Lollipop the Clown
description:
Re-live all the excitement of the circus with these colourful pair of thread painted clowns by Jenny McWhinney. The third of this delightful trio spins happily around his colouful maypole, accompanied by a chirpy bluebird that has nested on his striped umbrella.

Stitched on a luxurious cream cashmere, these vibrant clowns are a beautiful modern interpretation of classic circus imagery and will add a touch of whimsy and glee into your children's or grandchildren's nursery or playroom.

Kit Includes:
- All threads,  
- needles, 
- transfer materials,
- needle-felting pen tool,
- small needle-felting mat, 
- all instructions, diagrams & images needed to complete the design. 

Kit does not contain blanketing or backing fabric.

name: Fizz-Wizz the Clown
description:
Re-live all the excitement of the circus with these colourful pair of thread painted clowns by Jenny McWhinney. The first of this delightful trio skips merrily along with his lollypop, followed closely by his little but loyal snail side-kick 

Stitched on a luxurious cream cashmere, these vibrant clowns are a beautiful modern interpretation of classic circus imagery and will add a touch of whimsy and glee into your children's or grandchildren's nursery or playroom.

Kit Includes:
- All threads, 
- needles, 
- transfer materials, 
- all instructions, diagrams & images needed to complete the design. 

*This kit does not contain blanketing or backing fabric.

Please Note: For this project you will need basic needle felting tool including a needle-felting pen & small needle-felting brush as it includes elements of felted raised embroidery. These tools can be purchased in the 'notions' section.

name: Jelly Bean the Clown
description:
Re-live all the excitement of the circus with these colourful pair of thread painted clowns by Jenny McWhinney. The second of this delightful trio displays his acrobatic prowess by juggling his brightly colourd balls whilst on tippy-toe to entertain the crowd.

Stitched on a luxurious cream cashmere, these vibrant clowns are a beautiful modern interpretation of classic circus imagery and will add a touch of whimsy and glee into your children's or grandchildren's nursery or playroom.

Kit Includes:
- All threads, 
- needles, 
- transfer materials, 
- all instructions, diagrams & images needed to complete the design. 

Kit does not contain blanketing or backing fabric.

Please Note: For this project you will need basic needle felting tool including a needle-felting pen & small needle-felting brush as it includes elements of felted raised embroidery. These tools can be purchased in the 'notions' section.

name: The Chimpanzee
description:
The Chimpanzee, a previously unreleased design by Jenny McWhinney, captures the placid, soulful and intelligent nature of one of the most striking and endangered of African primates. 

The design is worked in a beautiful contrast of wools  and stranded cottons that gives off a stunning three-dimensional effect. 

As the first of a series of three, including the chimpanzee, an orangutan, and a baboon, this project is sure to be a striking addition to any home. 

When framed as triptych, these regal primates are an  eye-catching piece when mounted in a gentlemen's study or library. 

This series is also a wonderful sister-project for stitchers who have completed or are working on Jenny's amazing Samburu Africa designs.

Kit Includes
 - All threads (Gumnut Yarns mohair)
 - Needles
 - Transfer material
 - Instructions
 - Step by step diagrams
 - Coloured images
 - Fabric, Doctor's fannel 60 x 60 cm

name: Eddy The Elephant
description:
Whether you support AFL, NRL or  Soccer, these delightful elephants are sure to score a goal with sports fans everywhere. Introducing Eddy the Elephant, Jenny McWhinney’s newest design, with a fully customised pattern to compliment your favourite team!Stitched in a contrast of soft wools & stranded cottons this fabulous design is a great option for stitchers of all skill levels.

The wonderful Crows cushion pictured was stitched by Jill Peters, one of Jenny's very talented students.

Design measure 32 x 23 cm.

Kit Contains:
 - All threads,
 - Needles,
 - Transfer material,
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams,
 - & images needed to complete the design.

This design is fully customised to suit one of your favorite AFL, NRL or soccer team. Just leave us a message in the "Add Special Instructions To Merchant" option at checkout. 

Eg. Adelaide Crows, AFL 
OR Socceroos, Soccer 
OR Kangaroos, NRL

We will include the correct coloured threads in your kit & customise your pattern with the correct guernsey & ball.

*If no message is included with your order you will receive the design in a Collingwood AFL guernsey, as pictured.

**Please Note: Blanketing is not included in kit cost, but can be purchased from the 'notions' section of this store.

name: Warm Embrace (With Cashmere)
description:
This cuddly bunny with his rosy cheeks sits amidst a garden of lavender and toadstools. His bluebird friends flutter-by to sing him a tune.

This luxurious cashmere knee rug is stiched in an assortment of fine wools and silks. It is sure to be popular with children, grand-children and nature-lovers alike. This would be a beautiful gift for a newborn, as the charming embroidered scene is inspired by Spring's beauty and rebirth.

Kit includes:
 - All threads,
 - Fine wool Cashmere (100 x 75 cm),
 - Transfer material,
 - Needles,
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams,
 - & images needed to complete the design.

name: Warm Embrace
description:
PRE-ORDER NOW! Shipping on the 7th of February 2011...

This cuddly bunny with his rosy cheeks sits amidst a garden of lavender and toadstools. His bluebird friends flutter-by to sing him a tune.

This luxurious cashmere knee rug is stiched in an assortment of fine wools and silks. It is sure to be popular with children, grand-children and nature-lovers alike. This would be a beautiful gift for a newborn, as the charming embroidered scene is inspired by Spring's beauty and rebirth.

Kit includes:
 - All threads,
 - Transfer material,
 - Needles,
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams,
 - & images needed to complete the design.

* Please note fabric is not included. This kit is available with cashmere included in the 'Kits' section of store.

name: Catching Wild Butterflies
description:
'Catching Wild Butterflies' is an exquisite design featuring a delightful rabbit admiring the butterflies as he plays in the fields. With the thread painting elements of the rug by Jenny McWhinney & beautiful raised butterflies & catcher by Jan Kerton, this project is sure to bring pleasure to those who enjoy both thread painting and stumpwork embroidery. Perfect for a child's playroom, or even for a newborn's nursery.

Kit includes:
- All threads,
- Fine wool blanketing in ivory (75 x 100cm)
- Needles,
- Solvie,
- Instructions,
- Diagrams,
- & Images needed to complete the design.

name: Strawberry Jam (With Blanketing)
description:
Strawberry Jam is Jenny's newest design featuring her well loved bunnies. A trio of fawn rabbits are captured playful position amoungst a fiels of juicy strawberries. This sweet project is suitable for both girls and boys, and would be an adorable addition to any new-born's nursery. Worked on a gorgeous avocado fine wool blanketing in Appleton Crewel wools this project is suitiable for stitchers of all skill levels.

Kit Contains:

 - Avocado fine wool blanketing (80 x 120 cm)
 - All threads & wools
 - All intructions
 - All step-by-step diagrams & images
 - Transfer paper
 - Needles

Everything you need to complete the design!

name: Kokeshi (Complete Bolster Cushion Kit)
description:
The Kokeshi is a traditional Japanese doll. Carved from wood by skilled artists, the kokeshi is thought to have spiritual significance representing the wish for a healthy child. This design by Jenny McWhinney captures the innocence and simplicity of the kokeshi in vibrant coloured wools. 
What makes design so unique is that it incorporates the skill of wool felting to create the crisp white faces & rosey cheeks of the dolls, & the delicate cherry blossoms by their feet.
'Kokeshi' is a modern take on traditional oriental imagery, & is sure to be a well loved addition to any girl's bedroom - from young to teens!
Kit includes:
 - All threads,
 - Felting wools,
 - Fine wool blanketing (Sky Blue),
 - Turquoise edging,
 - Pink & white butterfly fabric,
 - Dark pink fabric,
 - Transfer materials,
 - Needles,
 - Patterns,
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams,
 - & images to complete the design.

Jenny's sample, as shown in the images, pictures the design made into a fabulous bolster cushion in blues, pinks and a hint of turquoise. This kit includes all assmbly fabrics & instructions, but does not include the cushion insert or cording.

* Please note: To complete the felting technique in this project, you will need a stiff felting brush and a felting pen. These are available separately in the store.

name: Miss Lavender
description:
Miss Lavendar carrying her cotton reel. Part of the fabulous 'Sewing Sisters' series by Jenny McWhinney & Jan Kerton.

These quaint little mice, designed by Jenny, are quick and easy projects that can be completed in a weekend. These kits are also a great option for the begginer thread painter, as they include detailed instructions with plenty of images.

Perfect to stitch onto sewing related items, or even a set of framed pictures to brighten up your sewing room. Embroidered in colourful stranded cottons, you are sure to be the envy of your sewing group or guild when you take out your Sewing Sisters needle case or thread bag!   

Kit Contains:
 - Printed design on fabric - No tracing required!
 - Labeled threads on thread-card
 - Colour step-by-step for thread painting
 - Large colour placement chart
 - Clear step-by-step instructions by Jan Kerton

name: Miss Violet
description:
The charming Miss Violet. Part of the fabulous 'Sewing Sisters' series by Jenny McWhinney & Jan Kerton.

These quaint little mice, designed by Jenny, are quick and easy projects that can be completed in a weekend. These kits are also a great option for the begginer thread painter, as they include detailed instructions with plenty of images.

Perfect to stitch onto sewing related items, or even a set of framed pictures to brighten up your sewing room. Embroidered in colourful stranded cottons, you are sure to be the envy of your sewing group or guild when you take out your Sewing Sisters needle case or thread bag!   

Kit Contains:
 - Printed design on fabric - No tracing required!
 - Labeled threads on thread-card
 - Colour step-by-step for thread painting

name: Miss Poppy
description:
Miss Poppy and her pencil. Part of the fabulous 'Sewing Sisters' series by Jenny McWhinney & Jan Kerton.

These quaint little mice, designed by Jenny, are quick and easy projects that can be completed in a weekend. These kits are also a great option for the begginer thread painter, as they include detailed instructions with plenty of images.

name: Sewing Sisters Needle Case Pattern
description:
Create this gorgeous Sewing Sisters Needle Case designed by Jan Kerton & Bev Stayner!

This handy thread case is the perfect place to store all of your needle packets, needle scans and loose needles. Featured on the front of the case is an adorable thread painted design by Jenny McWhinney. The 'Sewing Sisters' thread painting kits are available now, but only for a limited time!

Pattern contains full instructions to make your wonderful thread painting project into this beautiful needle case. (Needle case measures 17.5 x 16 cm)

name: Sewing Sisters Thread Bag Pattern
description:
Create this gorgeous Sewing Sisters Thread Bag designed by Jan Kerton & Bev Stayner!

This roomy thread bag is the perfect place to store all of your silks, cottons, wools & thinmbles. Featured on the front of the bag is an adorable thread painted design by Jenny McWhinney. The 'Sewing Sisters' thread painting kits are available now, but only for a limited time!

Pattern contains full instructions to make your wonderful thread painting project into this useful thread bag. (Thread bag measures 20 x 18 x 5 cm)

name: Catching Wild Butterflies (Without Blanketing)
description:
'Catching Wild Butterflies' is an exquisite design featuring a delightful rabbit admiring the butterflies as he plays in the fields. With the thread painting elements of the rug by Jenny McWhinney & beautiful raised butterflies & catcher by Jan Kerton, this project is sure to bring pleasure to those who enjoy both thread painting and stumpwork embroidery. Perfect for a child's playroom, or even for a newborn's nursery.

Kit includes:

*Please note: this kit does not include blanketing, but can be purchased with blanketing in the 'Kits' section of this store.

The Kokeshi is a traditional Japanese doll. Carved from wood by skilled artists, the kokeshi is thought to have spiritual significance representing the wish for a healthy child. This design by Jenny McWhinney captures the innocence and simplicity of the kokeshi in vibrant coloured wools. 
What makes design so unique is that it incorporates the skill of wool felting to create the crisp white faces & rosey cheeks of the dolls, & the delicate cherry blossoms by their feet.
'Kokeshi' is a modern take on traditional oriental imagery, & is sure to be a well loved addition to any girl's bedroom - from young to teens!

 - Transfer materials,
 - Needles,
 - Patterns,

 - Diagrams,
 - & images to complete the design.

Jenny's sample, as shown in the images, pictures the design made into a fabulous bolster cushion. The kit for the complete cushion (including blanketing, assembly fabrics & instructions) is available in the store. This listing is for the stitching kit only. The blanketing pictured can be purchased separetely if you wish to make the design into a rug or throw.

* Please note: To complete the felting technique in this project, you will need a stiff felting brush and a felting pen. These are available separately in the store.

name: Strawberry Jam (Without Blanketing)
description:
Strawberry Jam is Jenny's newest design featuring her well loved bunnies. A trio of fawn rabbits are captured playful position amoungst a fiels of juicy strawberries. This sweet project is suitable for both girls and boys, and would be an adorable addition to any new-born's nursery. Worked on a gorgeous avocado fine wool blanketing (but also looks great on sky blue or cream) in Appleton Crewel wools this project is suitiable for stitchers of all skill levels.

Kit Contains:

- All threads & wools
- All intructions
- All step-by-step diagrams & images
- Transfer paper
- Needles

*Please note this kit does not contain blanketing, but the kit with blanketing included is also available in the kit section of the store.

name: Oasis
description:
'Oasis' is one of Jenny's original designs from her popular and well-loved Arabian series. This design features a camel proudly walking through the sand dunes, with a beautiful Arabian city in the distance. This thread painted marvel can be embroidered on any number of items - a regal throw rug or wall hanging for your lounge room, or even a rug for your bed room.

This listing is for the complete Oasis kit, it includes:
 - All threads,
 - Needles,
 - Transfer plastic,
 - Instructions,
 - Images,
 - Diagrams
 - & step-by-steps to complete the design.

Please note that this kit does not include wool blanketing. A selection of wool blanketing is available in the notion section of this store.

name: Making Curtains Kit
description:
Making Curtains is a sweet little design featuring a little mouse working away at her sewing machine. Suggested for stitching in stranded cottons, the design delicate, but due to it's small size (12 x 12cm) is perfect to complete over a relaxing weekend. The design would look lovely used on a needlebook, sewing bag or even as a framed piece to cheer up your own sewing room! 

Kit Includes:
 - All thread,
 - needles,
 - solvie,
 - instructions,
 - diagrams,
 - images,
 - & fabric needed to complete the design

name: Pen-Style Needle Felting Tool
description:
The Pen Style Needle Felting Tool by Clover allows application of small or delicate materials using one, two, or three needles. The tool can be adjusted to two length of needle sizes that can be used with the Needle Felting Molds (sold separately) for creating 3-dimensional design and applique. The handle offers ease of use because of the "Pen Style" grip action. Easy replacement of thick and thin needles. 

This needle felting pen is needed to create Jenny's 'Kokeshi' design. Jenny will be using a unique fusion of needle felting & thread painting techniques in many of her future designs.

name: Needle Felting Mat
description:
Needle felting mat by Clover. The brush-like mat enables smooth punching with little resistance, and allows the fibers to meshed with the base fabric. The mat bristle length provides the ideal hardness and density for felting. Measures: 2 3/4" x 3 1/2". 

This mat is needed to create Jenny's 'Kokeshi' design. Jenny will be using a unique fusion of needle felting & thread painting techniques in many of her future designs.

name: 5 Barb Needle Felting Tool
description:
Needle Felting Tool by Clover. This felting tool has 5 barb needles. The tool has a spring type action which allows the fibers to mesh with the base fabric. This tool cannot be used with Felting Needle Applique Molds. Gauge 40.

This needle felting pen is needed to create Jenny's 'Kokeshi' design. Jenny will be using a unique fusion of needle felting & thread painting techniques in many of her future designs.

name: Thread Painting - Bunnies In My Garden, book by Jenny McWhinney
description:
"This delightful book, written by world-renowned embroiderer Jenny McWhinney, is sure to bring a smile to your lips and an incredible sense of self-satisfaction to your heart. 

From beginner to the experienced stitcher, these twelve designs, each with detailed instructions, will capture your imagination through embroidery.

Detailed patterns, diagrams and simple, unique instructions throughout".

Paperback, 120 pages, full colour.

*If you would like your copy signed by Jenny, please leave the recipient's name in the 'notes' section at checkout.

name: Samburu: Complete Kit
description:
*FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY* complete the entire Samburu project for a discounted price of $455, rather than purchasing the designs separately for $484.00. A saving of $29.00!
 
Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope. This progect then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.
Each section of this design can be broken down into individual projects, such as cushions or smaller rugs.

Samburu: Complete Kit Includes:

1 x Samburu: Lion Kit
1 x Samburu: Zebra Kit
1 x Samburu: Giraffe Kit
1 x Samburu: Cheetah Kit
1 x Samburu: Elephant Kit
1 x Samburu: Gazelle & Grasslands Kit
1 x Samburu: The Colourful People Kit

Don't miss out on this wonderful limited offer! Only while stocks last.
*Please Note: Fabric used to complete the design is not included but can be purchased in the Notions section on the store.

name: Ivory Wool Cashmere 150 x 160 cm (Samburu Size)
description:
Fine wool cashmere in a beautifully crisp Ivory. Measures 150 x 160 cm - the perfect size on which to work the complete Samburu design! Luxuriously soft & won't 'pile' with age as some blanketing tends to. But also suitable for use as a wall hanging or large throw rug.

Please note that images will vary in colour from monitor to monitor. This blanketing is best described as a soft, light ivory cream.
*Gently hand wash in warm water.

name: Doctor's Flannel, Cot Size (82 x 98 cm)
description:
Fine Doctor's Flannel in ivory, in the perfect size for baby blankets (82 x 98 cm, cot size).

Doctor's flannel is a fabulous option when creating projects (such as rugs & blankets) intended for use in the hot summer months. 

*washable by hand

*Please note, Colours may differ from monitor to monitor. 'This shade of ivory is best described as a creamy winter white.

name: Samburu: The Colourful People
description:
The regal Samburu People are featured around the border of the Samburu rug. Each group shows different activities of African culture & measure 13x15 (4.5x6"), there are a total of four groups included in the design. The entire rug measures aprox. 140x130cm (55x55"). 

Samburu features giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby. 

Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope. This progect then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.
Each section of this project is sold seperately so personal choices can be made in regards to whether the entire rug is worked, or broken down into individual projects, such as cushions or smaller rugs. 

Kit Contains:
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper 
 - Assorted wools
 - Silks
 - Beads
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - Coloured image
 - All instructions & patterns (including step-by-step scans) to complete this project

* Please note: Fabric is not included, but available in the notions section of this store.

name: Samburu: Gazelle & Grasslands
description:
The border of the Samburu Rug features the sprightly gazelle leaping through the grassland plain of Africa. The entire rug measures aprox. 140x130cm (55x55"). 

Samburu features giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby. 

Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope. This progect then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.

Samburu features giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby.

name: Samburu: Zebra
description:
These beautiful Zebras (design measures 15x23cm, 6x9") are a striking part of Samburu...Africa rug.

The entire rug measures aprox. 140x130cm (55x55"). 

Samburu features lion head, giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby. Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope.

This project then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.

Each section of this project is sold seperately so personal choices can be made in regards to whether the entire rug is worked, or broken down into individual projects, such as cushions or smaller rugs. 

Kit Contains:
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper 
 - wool
 - Assorted perle' cottons
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - A4 coloured image
 - All instructions & patterns (including step-by-step scans) to complete this project

* Please note: Fabric is not included, but available in the notions section of this store.

name: Samburu: Cheetah
description:
These regal cheetas measure aprox. 23x23cm (9 1/2x9 1/2") & are part of the Samburu...Africa rug. 

The entire rug measures aprox. 140x130cm (55x55"). 

Samburu features a lion centrepiece, giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby. Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope. 

This project then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.

Each section of this project is sold seperately so personal choices can be made in regards to whether the entire rug is worked, or broken down into individual projects, such as cushions or smaller rugs. 

Kit Contains:
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper 
 - Assorted wools
 - Silks
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - A4 coloured image
 - All instructions & patterns (including step-by-step scans) to complete this project

* Please note: Fabric is not included, but will soon be available in the notions section of this store.

name: Samburu: Lion
description:
This magnificent lion's head measure aprox. 35x32cm (14x13") & is the centre of the Samburu...Africa rug. The entire rug measures aprox. 140x130cm (55x55"). 
Samburu features giraffes, zebras, cheetas & a mother elephant protecting her baby. 
Leaping amoungst the grasslands of Africa are the antelope. This progect then pays tribute to the people of Africa in their magnificent coloured robes and beautifully beaded necklaces.
Each section of this project is sold seperately so personal choices can be made in regards to whether the entire rug is worked, or broken down into individual projects, such as cushions or smaller rugs. 

Kit Contains:
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper 
 - Assorted wools
 - Silks
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - A3 coloured image
 - All instructions & patterns (including step-by-step scans) to complete this project

* Please note: Fabric is not included, but available in the notions section of this store.

name: Little Animals Complete Kit Series
description:
Complete the Little Animals Series at a great price! - The original price of these adorable mini kits was $32.00, but for a limited time you can purchase all 12 little animals for $275 - a total saving of $109!

You will receive:

1 x Little Goat, Wash Day Mini Kit
1 x Little Red Hen, Hatching Time Mini Kit
1 x Little Kitten, Hettie's Cat Mini Kit
1 x Little Owl, Silvery Moon Mini Kit
1 x Little Piglet, Farmer's Garden Mini Kit
1 x Little Robin, Christmas Eve Mini Kit
1 x Little Duckling, Swimming Lessons Mini Kit
1 x Little Tree Frog, Tropical Flowers Mini Kit
1 x Little Hedgehog, Wrong Way Mini Kit
1 x Little Squirrel, Collecting Berries Mini Kit
1 x Little Fish, Under The Lilly Pad Mini Kit
1 x Little Dog, Dinner Time Mini Kit

Each mini kit contains all instructions, diagrams, images, threads, needles, fabric & transfer material required to complete the design. 

This offer only available whilst until the end of October or whilst stocks last. Don't miss out on this fabulous special!

name: Bamboo the Panda
description:
This design captures a lifelike Chinese panda relaxing by the bamboo. 
'Bamboo the Panda' has been designed for beginners. He is worked in thicker ply wool and therefore is quite a quick project using simple yet effective stitches.
*Hint: Before starting, make a nice cup of tea, put your feet up, & read all instructions carefully.. I promise success will follow!

Kit contains: 
 - Solvi, water-soluable transfer plastic/paper
 - Assorted crewel wools
 - Tapestry wools
 - Fine embroidery wools
 - Pearle silks
 - Stranded cotton
 - Stranded Silk
 - Needles
 - All written instructions, Patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

*Please note: Fabric is not included.
Suggested fabric: Fine wool blanketing or doctors flannel. Due to the colour of the panda, it is best worked on a coloured background. I have worked the design in pale green, but pinks and blues could be substituted. 

Recommended for use as a knee rug or framed picture.

name: Market Day
description:
This project is certainly an evergreen. As a Sequel to Midnight Feast, it once again stars Milly & Mr. Pip on their way to market with the farmer's produce.

This design appeals to both boys & girls, & looks lovely embroidered on any colour blanketing.

Kit contains:
- Water soluble transfer plastic
- Assorted wools
- Stranded cottons
- Metallic blending filament
- Small glass beads
- Needles
- Thread card
- All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

*Please note: Kit does not contain fabric.
Recommended fabric: Fine wool or wool cashmere in most colours

Suggested for use as a child's knee rug (shown), Nursery picture or wall hanging.

name: Midnight Feast
description:
This project is certainly an evergreen. It stars two little mice, Milly & Mr. Pip having a midnight feast on the farmer's apples. 
This design appeals to both boys & girls, & looks lovely embroidered on any colour blanketing. 

Kit contains:
 - Water soluble transfer plastic
 - Assorted wools
 - Stranded cottons
 - Metallic blending filament
 - Small glass beads
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

*Please note: Kit does not contain fabric.
Recommended fabric: Fine wool or wool cashmere in most colours

Suggested for use as a child's knee rug (shown), Nursery picture or wall hanging.

name: Monet's Memory Lane
description:
This design shows Monet strolling down Memory Lane on a warm Summer's day.
I have designed this small project as an introduction to my larger Monet projects. The little sign post reads 'Memory Lane', but can be adapted to read anything you desire. 

Kit contains:
 - 45x26cm Osnaberg fabric
 - 45x26cm Homespun backing fabric
 - Water soluble transfer plastic
 - Presencia stranded cottons
 - Rajmahal art silks
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

Suggested for use as a small bag (pictured), cushion, framed picture, patchwork quilt block or photo album cover.

name: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Not
description:
This little hedgehog sits amongst the flowers with a forget-me-not in hand, reciting the poem "She loves me, She loves me not".
The thread painted design is worked in different embroidery threads to obtain various textures & effects.
The project can be used for either male or female. For example, text may be changed to "He loves me, He loves me not."

Pattern Contains:
 - All instrictions,
 - Patterns,
 - Images needed to complete the design.

Suggested uses for this project include baby blanket (as shown), knee rug, cushion or framed picture

name: Carpenter Bear
description:
This is a fun project to learn many different skills in thread painting.
Perfect gift option for husbands, brothers, sons & grandsons.

Kit Contains:
 - fine crewel wools,
 - cottons,
 - silks,
 - metallic threads,
 - miniature buttons,
 - needles,
 - patterns,
 - instructions

*Please note: Fabric is not included.

Recommended fabric: fine wool blanketing or wool cashmere. 

Suggested for use as a knee rug (as shown) or framed picture.

name: Manor Mouse with Blanketing (62 x 80cm)
description:
Usually $95.00, but now only $70.00 for a limited time only!

This little mouse is checking to see if any bread crumbs have been left on the kitchen floor. He carries a glowing candle to light his way, whilst the moon & stars twinkle in the sky.
A great project for beginners, as the design includes large areas of interlocked straight stitch and simple colouring. 

Kit contains:
 - Navy blue blanketing 
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper
 - Assorted wools
 - Stranded cottons
 - Blending filament
 - Miniature buttons
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

* Please note: Backing fabric not included.


Design measures approx. 17cmx20cm

name: Autumn Squirrel
description:
This small squirrel nestled against the ferns makes an ideal thread painted keepsake for yourself or even to give as a gift. 
Design measures 11cm x 11cm.

Kit contains:
 - Osnaberg fabric
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper
 - Mohair wools
 - Silks
 - All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

Suggested for use as a small pincushion stool, needle book, framed picture or treasure bag.

name: Red Squirrel
description:
The Red Squirrel design makes a wonderful gift for a fellow stitcher. Worked in a combination of silk and mohair, this small yet charming project can be easily completed in a weekend.

Kit contains:
 - Linen fabric
 - Water soluable transfer plastic/paper
 - Silks
 - Mohair yarns
 - Perle cottons
 - Tiny beads
 - Needles
 - Thread card
 - All written instruction, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

Suggested for use as a pincushion stool (pictured), picture, needle case or small treasure bag.

description:
100 % premium wool blanketing in Ivory, perfect for thread painting & embroidery projects. Available in a range of stunning pastel colours. 

size: 80 x 120 cm / 31 x 47 inches

*washable by hand

name: Apple Bunny
description:
this little fellow is busy picking apples and putting the in his little string bag. Apple pie for tea.

Kit Contains:
 - Wool blanketing (16x16")
 - Transfer pattern
 - Assorted wools
 - Assorted pearle threads
 - Assorted stranded cottons
 - Felt
 - Needles
 - All instructions, patterns & step-by-step diagrams needed to complete the project.

Suggested Use: Cushion, Picture or rug.

name: Kookaburra Morning Chill
description:
The Kookaburra is a magnificent bird and no matter how many times I am lucky enough to see one their beauty always takes my breath away. This beautiful kookaburra design will sure to delight you everytime you see it in your home.

Kit Contains:

- 32 assorted threads
- 1 x extra fine wool
- 13 x fine wools
- 2 x Fine Mohair wool
- 13 x Stranded cottons
- 2 x Pearle cottons
- Needles
- Chenille No. 22 [C#22]…for wool, mohair
- Chenille No. 20 [C#20}…for Pearle cottons
- Embroidery No.8 [E#8]…for stranded cottons
-Water soluble Transfer Plastic
- Large Coloured working scan
- 15 pages of step-by-step scans, diagrams and written instructions required to successfully complete the project

Suggested Fabric: Wool blanketing, Doctors flannel or embroidery linen

name: Possum & Gum Flowers
description:
This design features a wide-eyed Australia Feathertail Possum peering through the gum flowers. The stumpwork gumleaves and flowers add a beautiful textural quality to this design & act as a stunning tribute to Australian native flora and fauna.

Kit Contains:
- Water soluble transfer plastic
- Assorted wools
- Stranded cottons
- Needles
- Thread card
- All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

*Please note: Kit does not contain fabric.
Recommended fabric: Fine wool or wool cashmere in most colours.

Suggested for use as a cushion cover, framed picture or throw rug.

name: Resting Camels
description:
These richly dressed Resting Camels are sure to add a touch of exotic flavour to your home. Worked in stranded cottons, they are vibrant in both colour and texture.

- Water soluble transfer plastic
- Stranded cottons
- Thread card
- All written instructions, patterns & diagrams to complete the project.

*Please note: Kit does not contain fabric.
Recommended fabric: Fine wool or upholsetry linen.

Suggested Use: Bolster cushion (as pictured), framed picture or wall hanging.

name: Little Goat, Wash Day
description:
This litte billy goat is ready to cause some mischief on washing day.

As part of Jenny's 'Twelve Litte Animals' block of the month series, these mini kits can be used to create small projects, such as cushions, bags, needle books & nursery pictures, or stitch all 12 in the series & use the designs as part of a patchwork quilt or wall hanging. Each of these charming creatures are quick & easy projects that are lots of fun to stitch.

Kit Contains:

 - All Threads,
 - Needles,
 - Transfer Plastic,
 - Fabric (2 pieces of quilter's muslin 30 x 30 cm),
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams,
 - & Images to complete the project.

description:

name: Little Black Shoes, Recess
description:
Little Black Shoes is a range of fun & fabulous stitchery patterns to delight both the young & young-at-heart.

These designs can be stitched & made into many things; perfect for gifts, cushions, mini bags, needle books, the possibilites are endless. Or stitch all 11 designs & use them as the patches in a quilt. These designs appeal to girls of all ages & put a modern spin on traditional stitchery designs.

Stitchery Pattern Includes:
 - All patterns, diagrams & instructions to complete the design.

See additional photos for project examples.

name: 'Solvie' (Water Soluable Transfer Paper) - 1 metre
description: Sold by the metre, this water soluable transfer paper (75cm wide), affectionately known as 'Solvie', provides ease of  transfer when stitching a new project. Simply draw your design onto the Solvie with a micron pen, tack or pin onto your fabric & stitch directly over the top! The paper disolves in water and speeds up the process of tacking a design. Use the quantity option in the shopping cart to purchase multiple metres.

name: Making Curtains
description:
Making Curtains is a sweet little design featuring a little mouse working away at her sewing machine. Suggested for stitching in stranded cottons, the design delicate, but due to it's small size (12 x 12cm) is perfect to complete over a relaxing weekend. The design would look lovely used on a needlebook, sewing bag or even as a framed piece to cheer up your own sewing room! 
*Pattern only, kit coming soon.

name: Ivory Wool Blanketing 150 x 150 cm (Samburu Size)
description:
Fine wool blanketing in a beautifully crisp Ivory. Measures 150 x 150 cm - the perfect size on which to work the complete Samburu design! But also suitable for use as a wall hanging or large throw rug.

Please note that images will vary in colour from monitor to monitor. This blanketing is best described as a soft, light  ivory cream.
*Gently hand wash in warm water.

name: Little Black Shoes Complete Pattern Set
description:
*FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!* Purchase the complete Little Black Shoes series & save. Usually $106.45, you can purchase all 11 patterns for only $89.50, save $16.95!

Little Black Shoes is a range of fun & fabulous stitchery patterns to delight both the young & young-at-heart.

These designs can be stitched & made into many things; perfect for gifts, cushions, mini bags, needle books, the possibilites are endless. Or stitch all 11 designs & use them as the patches in a quilt. These designs appeal to girls of all ages & put a modern spin on traditional stitchery designs.

You will receive:
1 x Playtime pattern
1 x YoYo pattern
1 x Hopscotch pattern
1 x Silent Reading pattern
1 x Skipping pattern
1 x Recess pattern
1 x Quilting pattern
1 x Cat's Milk pattern
1 x Tennis pattern
1 x Hoop'n'Stick pattern
1 x ABC's pattern

Stitchery Pattern Includes:
- All patterns, diagrams & instructions to complete the design.

name: Christmas Pudding
description:
*PRE-CHRISTMAS SPECIAL* Usually $85.00, but now $70.00 for a limited time only!

This beautifully festive design is sure to be a hit with the children & grandchildren when the stockings are brought out on Christmas Eve! Featuring a singing robin atop a plump Christmas pudding, the design is bold but classial.

Kit Includes:
 - All threads,
 - Needles
 - Instructions,
 - Diagrams
 - & Images
Needed to complete the design.

*Blanketing can be purchased separately in the notions section of this store.

name: Oasis, Pattern
description:
'Oasis' is one of Jenny's original designs from her popular and well-loved Arabian series. This design features a camel proudly walking through the sand dunes, with a beautiful Arabian city in the distance. This thread painted marvel can be embroidered on any number of items - a regal throw rug or wall hanging for your lounge room, or even a rug for your bed room.

This listing is for the pattern only. The pattern includes all instructions, diagrams & images to complete the design.
